name: paperless-ngx
description: Paperless-ngx is a modern self-hosted document management system. It automates scanning, OCR, tagging, and storage of documents with a user-friendly UI and robust search features.
features: Automated OCR: Optical character recognition automatically extracts text from scanned documents and images for full-text search
Document tagging: Organize documents with custom tags, correspondents, and document types for flexible categorization
Consumption folder: Monitor designated folders for new documents and automatically import, process, and index them
Advanced search: Powerful search with filters, boolean operators, and full-text queries to quickly locate documents
Email integration: Import documents directly from email attachments by forwarding messages to dedicated mailbox
Mobile app support: Companion mobile apps for iOS and Android enable document scanning and access from smartphones
Custom metadata: Define custom fields and metadata schemas to capture document-specific information beyond standard attributes
Workflow automation: Create rules to automatically tag, rename, or route documents based on content, sender, or criteria
Multi-user access: User management with permissions controls who can view, edit, or delete documents for secure collaboration
API and webhooks: RESTful API and webhook support enable integration with external tools and custom automation workflows
